  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Geometrijski liki - tombola</string>
            <string language="en">Geometrical shapes - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrische Formen - Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formes géométriques - bingo-test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formas geométricas - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Figure geometriche - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρικές μορφές - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dimensiones de una variable geométricas - bingo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci s pomočjo igre utrjujejo poznavanje geometrijskih likov.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of images of geometric shapes that can be printed and cut to make set of cards that are suitable to play Concentration (Memory).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lik</string>
            <string language="en">shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trikotnik</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tombola</string>
            <string language="en">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kvadrat</string>
            <string language="en">square</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krog</string>
            <string language="en">circle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Bilder der geometrischen Formen, die gedruckt 
werden können und Schnitt, um Set von den Karten zu bilden, die für 
Spiel Konzentration (Speicher) verwendbar sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble d'images des formes géométriques qui 
peuvent être imprimées et coupe pour faire l'ensemble des cartes qui
conviennent à la concentration de jeu (mémoire).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo das imagens das formas geométricas que podem
ser imprimidas e corte para fazer o jogo dos cartões que são 
apropriados à concentração do jogo (memória).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle immagini delle figure geometriche 
che possono essere stampate e taglio per fare l'insieme delle schedi 
che sono adatte a concentrazione del gioco (memoria).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο εικόνων των γεωμετρικών μορφών που μπορούν να 
τυπωθούν και αποκοπή για να κάνουν το σύνολο καρτών που είναι 
κατάλληλες να παίξουν τη συγκέντρωση (μνήμη).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de imágenes de las dimensiones de una 
variable geométricas que se pueden imprimir y corte para hacer el 
conjunto de las tarjetas que son convenientes a la concentración del 
juego (memoria).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadrat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bingo-test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">place</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
